Look feel and performance show it's good quality.

It’s great for around town but not for hiking or anywhere serious. The jacket is waterproof/windproof and light but biggest issue I have with this jacket is the hood is way too small and when it raining , the water is all over my face and I end up having to wear a cap under it to prevent this .

评论概述: The Inside is liner-less and like a cold, shiny tarp.
评论详情: The look and cut of this jacket are great. However, the deal breaker is the lack of a lining of any kind. The inside is shiny, cold to the touch gray membrane that is not something you want against your bare skin. If you will ONLY wear with something long sleeved underneath, could be fine. But if you would sometimes last want to wear short sleeves on a warm rainy day, this will not make your skin happy to have it touching.

I went to climb Mt Fuji for a birthday event. The weather up there in the summer is unpredictable. Wind and rain, random storms. I did not have a rain jacket, and I needed one asap! Lucky me it was prime week and this was on sale! I ordered it, got it in two days and I took it Mt Fuji. Climbed it! Good thing I have this jacket in my sack. It started raining 5 hours in to the 9 hour climb. Made it to the to at hour 6 and slid half way down the rain to some ramen and hot springs!!! Epic trip, and this jacket kept me dry from the rain!  Very happy with this purchase.!!!!

评论概述: Light weight, easy pack and carry while traveling
评论详情: Took this jacket on a recent trip to the nordic countries and it was prefectly suited for the trip. It has excellent rain repellent characteristics as well as protecting as a wind breaker. It is very light weight and takes up very little space in a carry-on or in a valise. I couldn't have asked for anything better for our trip.

Have used it a few times and it works like a charm. Looks and fits good too!!

This Marmott gortex shell is exactly what I need for my hikes and walks! It gives great rain and win protection - I also love the vents under the arms. It would be great if it had a two way zipper to vent for the lower body a nice to have for vigorous exercise. I also sized up so I could layer underneath.

I've purchased a few other light rain coats without the gortex cloth/liners, and they have worked fine, except that they hold a lot of humidity inside on warmish days.  So, I decided to give this relatively inexpensive gortex rain jacket a try--have had good luck with gortex other gortex jackets that ran a bit heavy. This one works fine--its very light, packable, and quite breathable relative to the others (including other marmot rain jackets).  Relative to most of the other that i've tried over to the year its abit quieter as well, although there is some crinkling noise as one moves, its not as loud as on most my other recent purchases of light rain jackets.  Lightness is very useful both for hiking and business travel. It fits well, is reasonably dressy, and does its job of keeping water off you back. Just what I was looking for.
Marmot quality. Goretex dry and breathable. Comfortable fit
Fine

评论概述: Good overall wind and rain protection

The jacket kept me warm on cloudy and windy days, and just opening and closing the side zippers allowed me to adjust to when the wind died and the sun peeked out.

Lately I've been kinda disappointed with my online purchases, but not this one. Perfect for a day hike or travel. Even warm weather water sports like boating and fishing. Very comfortable and packs up tight. The xl fits almost perfect for my 6'1" 200 lbs frame. If you were any taller it might be a little too short. I wouldn't mind if it was a little longer, but It is still my new favorite light weight rain jacket. Get the Jacket and when its raining look up and remember Who the rainbow belongs to and what it represents. Repent and ask for forgiveness. Its not to late until it is...but this jacket will keep you dry until then :D

A ver... quien se compra una chaqueta de este tipo es porque debe soportar caidas de agua importante sin que le cale. Es una chaqueta gore-tex con costuras y cremalleras selladas. Mojarte por la lluvia, no te vas a mojar. Si vas bien protegido debajo, aguantarás temperaturas "bajas" y la lluvia no será un problema para tus rutas de senderismo. Eso si, es una chaqueta cara que si la usas con frecuencia la tendrás que cambiar en un par de años (todas las membranas de este tipo pierden eficacia con el tiempo). Hay otras membranas más baratas y que te hacen el mismo efecto. Eso si, la chaqueta es buena y está bien hecha.

Je suis ravi de mon achat. Cette veste est incroyablement légère et confortable, tout en offrant une excellente protection contre la pluie. La coupe est ajustée, ce qui permet une bonne liberté de mouvement, et les poches sont bien placées pour un accès facile. De plus, elle est respirante, ce qui est un grand plus lors d'activités intenses.  En résumé, c'est une veste de qualité qui répond à toutes mes attentes. Die Jacke hat einen boxy-Cut. Das sieht tatsächlich sehr modisch und modern aus. Ich hab mit 192cm / 83 kg in eine L sehr gut reingepasst. Normalerweise habe ich bei amerikanischen Marken oft bei L am Bauch viel zu viel Platz. Hier aber nicht, das sah trotzdem gut aus. An den Schultern für mich angemessen, bin weder schmal noch breit. Auch die Länge (sonst immer ein Problem für mich) war angenehm, nicht zu kurz für den Outdooreinsatz aber auch nicht zu lang um komisch auszusehen. Die Kapuze hatte auch eine kleine Verstärkung vorne, hat mir gut gefallen. Deshalb schreibe ich auch diese Rezension, weil viele Outdoorprodukte natürlich für den Outdooreinsatz geschnitten sind. Aber viele Leute tragen ihre Outdoorkleidung im Urlaub und im Alltag (warum auch nicht, wenn man so viel Geld ausgibt?). Jedenfalls ist es deshalb aber erfreulich, wenn diese Kleidung einen guten Schnitt hat. Das ist Marmot hier gelungen. Ich habe die Jacke aber zurückgeschickt, da ich für den Einsatz in den Bergen nicht so ein großer Fan des Paclite-Materials war. Von Gore-Tex ist Paclite auch nicht für Trekking empfohlen. Diese Jacke ist daher etwas für den Wanderer im Wald ohne schweres Gepäck. Ich habe stattdessen eine Jacke mit einer Außenschicht aus Polyamid (Goretex Performance Shell) gewählt.
Cumple su función , súper resistente a una tormenta fuerte, el cierre se atora un poco, solo mejoraría eso

Matières et finitions de qualité, belle coupe mais attention a la taille! Taille très grand. A voir comment ça tiens dans le temps.

Besonders hat mir der Preis gefallen 🙂, knapp 80 Euro, Tags drauf wieder 260, dann 130... werden wohl täglich gewürfelt die Preise, bei XXL zumindest.

Mi trovo in generale bene con prodotti di vestiario realizati con tecnologia gore-tex in quanto estremamente leggeri, assolutamente impermeabili, antvento e soprattutto traspiranti. Questa giacca non ha tradito le aspettative, soddisfatto, anche se forse veste leggermente abbondante.

Good rainproof jacket

This is a solid and cheaper Gore-Tex lightweigh hard shell/rain jacket. Note that this is Gore-Tex Paclite, which means you are getting the outer layer and membrane in an unlined format (hence the lighter weight). This differentiates it from the 3 layer 'Pro' jackets at much higher cost. It also means that you can pack it down really flat and it is really light.  What this means is that you are free to choose your own insulation and mid-layers to your own comfort and activity levels and probably means that it is a more flexible solution overall.  Like all Gore-tex jackets, it is super water resistent when new and will likely wane with time as the factory coating wears down before it needs to be re-proofed again. I cannot fault it and it is indeed windproof enough to cut the wind-chill of heavy mountain weather and arctic storms. Helpfully, it has pit-zips under the arms to help you regulate your temperature when the much-toucted Gore-Tex 'breathability' inevitably is insufficient.  A perfectly functional jacket suitable for outdoor pursuits in tough conditions and for casual use on a wet day.
Gute Passform und Qualitativ top 👍🏽
Extremely lightweight, waterproof and easy to wear…

Had marmot waterproofs before and they are well made especially with the Gore Tex three good pockets and a adjustable hood I’m a 43in chest so went for a large which allows for a fleece or light down jacket to be worn under it like the slightly longer sleeves the only minus for is that the hood isn’t stow able which would have been a nice touch  but recommended

La giacca è davvero impermeabile e pertanto il Goretex è 100%. L'ho usata sotto un acquazzone della madonna e le uniche cose che avevo bagnate erano le mie ascelle per la corsa che ho fatto per trovare riparo. Io sono alto 175cm e peso 100kg con poca panza e ho preso la taglia L. Avrei preso la XL per poter mettere una giacca sotto, però la speranza di dimagrire è sempre l'ultima a morire! Nennt mich verrückt, aber hat man bei Herrenjacken den Reissverschluss nicht in der linken Hand beim Zumachen? Bei dieser Jacke ist es rechts, wie bei einer Damenjacke. Vielleicht auch falsch geliefert? Außerdem: Kleine Kapuze und Passform wie eine 15€-Jacke.

Really well made and finished, lightweight waterproof jacket.  Unlined, but fits true to size.  Packs up very small; ideal for spring or summer walks when showers/rain is on the cards.

Die Jacke hat einen guten Schnitt. Ich bin 178cm groß, 84gk schwer und habe einen kleinen Wohlstandsbauch - Größe L hat aber ok gepasst, etwas zu weit, aber M war zu Körpernah für eine Fleeceschicht darunter.  Das Material fühlt sich sehr wertig an und hat einen leicht rauen Touch, also nicht Plastik-mäßig sondern erinnert an natürliches Material, gefällt mir sehr gut. Ist auch nicht so dünn, wie viele Regenjacken heutzutage.  Nun zu dem enttäuschenden Punkt:  KAPUZE Und jetzt zur größten Enttäuschung: die Kapuze. Da es sich bei dieser Jacke um eine REGENjacke handelt, ist die Kapuze von großer Bedeutung. Warum man diese dann nicht sinnvoll konstruiert, ist mir ein Rätsel. Erstens: die vordere Kante des Schirms der Kapuze reicht bei offenem Zustand gerade mal etwas über die Linie der Nasenspitze hinaus (vertikal betrachtet). Was heißt das bei Regen? Es regnet direkt ins Gesicht, keine Chance, sich abzuschirmen. Wenn man die Kapuze über den Verstellzug an der Kopfhinterseite fester zurrt, zieht es den Schirm noch näher an den Kopf (erinnert an den Schirm der Preussischen Pickelhauben). Lässt man den Verstellzug locker, reicht der Schirm zwar etwas weiter über das Gesicht nach vorne, dann bläst allerdings jeder Windstoß die Kapuze vom Kopf. Das nennt man Design, das am Papier gemacht wurde.  Und dann ist da noch die Verstellung der Kapuze: abgesehen davon, dass diese ausschließlich über die Kopfhinterseite erfolgen kann, ist das Band mit dem Griffstück derart filigran, dass es selbst mit meinen Künstlerhänden kein Leichtes ist, dieses zu bedienen. Ich will gar nicht wissen, wie das mit Handschuhen funktionieren soll. Wie gesagt, beim Festzurren zieht es einem dank der sinnbefreiten Verlegung der Kordel die Kapuze ins Gesicht und legt dieses schön frei, damit es freudig darauf regnen kann. Und wenn man den Zug wieder lockern will, weiß man nicht, wo man anziehen soll, denn es gibt keine Kordel zu sehen, die man ziehen könnte (ich habe irgendwo an der Außenkante der Kapuze herumgezerrt, das hat die Kordel etwas gelockert).  Bei solchen Details fragt man sich, ob es so schwer sein kann, Outdoor-Produkte zu entwickeln, die funktionieren?
Hab meine Jacke verloren mir die gleiche nochmal bestellt, sehr enttäuscht! Das Material fühlt sich dünner und minderwertiger an…naja schlecht fürs Image geht zurück und ich suche mir eine bessere;)

Il Gore-tex Paclite e il prezzo ragionevole (ca. 175€) sono i motivi principali per cui ho preso questa giacca. Volevo un guscio leggero, comprimibile e affidabile da usare per i viaggi ma anche che non avesse un aspetto troppo sportivo per non pregiudicarne l'uso nella vita di tutti i giorni. Il primo obiettivo è raggiunto all'80%, il secondo al 50%. Quanto al look, si vede che è un capo da trekking, anche se il taglio è lineare e i loghi sono poco visibili (praticamente grigio scurissimo su nero, quasi non si vedono). A proposito di un utilizzo trekking: - molto utili le zip per la ventilazione sotto le ascelle, sarebbe stato utile avere la zip frontale con doppio cursore per poterla aprire da sotto e far uscire calore in eccesso senza perdere protezione dalla pioggia, - la flap che dovrebbe coprire la zip principale non ha né velcro né bottoni per essere tenuta chiusa (non è un problema per l'uso che intendevo farne io ma ho seri dubbi sul suo utilizzo sotto un acquazzone in montagna perché la zip potrebbe far entrare acqua se il flap non la protegge), - quando la zip è tutta chiusa, il mento è direttamente a contatto con il tessuto esterno, non c'è una mentoniera più morbida come in molte altre giacche, questa è minimalista come dice il nome.
I usually buy North Face but this time I bought this one.  I am totally satisfied with it in every respect.
Guscio leggero e impermeabile bellissimo in inverno da abbinare con un piumino

Excellent value for a waterproof constructed from gore-tex.  This jacket uses gore-tex paclite, so the jacket is quite light and folds down small for easy carry. The hood is also very good, a single drawcord pulls the hood in, and the hood moves with your head.  Paclite is not the most breathable of the gore-tex materials and can wet out quickly. To help mitigate this, the jacket has underarm pit zips which work well.
so far so good.  nice stitching. seems well made.  nice fit.  zipper under arm are nice.  Good Quality Jacket.
Ceket gibi değil yağmurluk gibi hareket edince ses çıkarıyor

Cons: - If you are planning to have a jacket with hood as a layer, this jacket might be too tight and uncomfortable. A bulky beanie might also an issue. - Little coverage for face. - Zips are same as another Marmot jacket I had, and I wonder how long they will last since my other jacket's zips are dead with only casual usage.  Pros: - Price for a Gore-Tex rain jacket. - Enough room for layering.

Resistente, impermeabile, antivento, leggerissimo. Ripiegato per bene, nello zainetto occupa pochissimo spazio. Lo porto con me anche durante i miei giri in città. Con la L posso metterlo anche sopra giacca e camicia.
